CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1959, pg. A16 reads: "Married Last Saturday - Mr. and Mrs. James Andrews were married last Saturday by the Rev. William J. Harvey III at the home of the bride, who is the former Sonja Joannaha Wilson, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Samuel S. Wilson. Mrs. Emma Johnson, sister of the groom, was bridal attendant, and James Lowe, best man.  Ellis Wilson and Carl Cooper were ushers.  A reception followed the nuptials in Union Hall. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of groom James Andrews and bride Sonja Joannaha Wilson Andrews, cutting three tiered wedding cake with topper in Union Hall in front of jalousie windows
